com.itextpdf.io.font

Class FontConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.io.font.FontConstants
  • Deprecated. 
    Use constants from com.itextpdf.io.font.constants.

    @Deprecated
public class FontConstants
extends Object
    Font constants for FontProgramFactory and PdfFontFactory.
